about_the_game:
Add Hollowsk 1999 3D to your wishlist! That helps small developers like us a lot. Also, join our discord - we post updates there. We also plan to give access to the alpha versions of the game to Discord members, so please join if you're interested.



This town is full of familiar people whose faces cannot be remembered. Full of familiar streets and yards that never end. But you look like you’ve been here before - you do look familiar. You had to deliver that letter, but something went wrong with it.

Remember, you are not an outsider - these walls belong to you in the exact same way you belong to them. Those streets are full of dead ends, waiting for you to explore all of them. They all harbor some secrets for you...



This demo is a very short 5 to 10 mins teaser to show you the vibe and give some hints about storytelling and story direction. If I could, I would replace any "demo" words from the Steam page with "playable experience".

name: Hollowsk 1999 3D Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 1Gb
  • Sound Card: You should have one
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 4Gb
  • Sound Card: You should have a good one

short_description: This town is full of familiar people whose faces cannot be remembered. Full of familiar streets and yards that never end. But you look like you’ve been here before - you do look familiar. Join the howling monoliths drowning in the haze, uncover their mysteries in a slow-burn retro horror adventure.
